article_title: Blue Cross and Blue Shield of NC posts first loss in 15 years
article_text: Blue Cross and Blue Shield, North Carolina's largest health insurer, said Friday it posted its first financial loss in nearly two decades as a result of insuring older and sicker people under the Affordable Care Act.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Blue Cross, Blue Shield, Revenue, Executive, Compensation, Brad, Wilson, ACA, Affordable Care Act
